column1: See these scars of these years gone by
column2: 看着岁月留下的这些伤痕
column4: just remind me I can cry
column5: 它们不再伤害我，只是提醒我可以哭泣
column6: All that I know is we'll slip as we go
column7: 我知道只要我们出发就会有摔倒的可能
column8: Like dancers hold the bar across the wall
column9: 像舞者走出帷幕主持酒吧大局
column12: 拉起马儿，已经准备好了
column13: I'm not afraid to fight the war
column21: Not scared to feel the pain
column33: I met strangers to become my friends
column34: 陌生人成为了我的朋友
column35: Together we'll shine on this battlefield
column36: 我们一起在战场上闪耀
column40: I'm not afraid to fight the war
column48: Not scared to feel the pain
column58: All my reasons and my tears
column59: 我所有的理由所有的泪水
column60: They spill on this fake fall
column62: Aches and pains each took it out
column66: Melted wax on fireplaces pumping through my heart
column67: 从壁炉上融化的蜡流进我的心里
column68: I don't need this misery anymore
column76: Not scared to feel the pain
